fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • Changes made to an article didn’t make it into print, meaning that we included incorrect information about Climate Ready Clyde, a coalition of six councils, not eight. We said the coalition’s study warned that the cost of climate change to the Glasgow region could be “about £400m every year for the next three decades”. The report estimated that to be the annual cost by the 2050s, not the cost each year until then (New study counts cost of climate change neglect, 1 November, page 20). • Other recently corrected articles include: Crossbench MPs confirm push for federal anti-corruption commission Snitch on a teacher: Bolsonaro win sparks push against ‘indoctrination’
